version_description:
- Added save list of custom charging animation
- Streamlined application: Removed the unplug and full animation function
- App supports new localization

- Added "Hot & Popular" animation list
- Fixed some sound playback bugs in silent mode
- Added some localization metadata

- Change the app preview to Christmas
- Adjust the homepage UI
- Added Hot recently and anime animations
- Provide in-app purchases to remove ads
- Custom charging animation support deletion

- Adjusted the animation sequence according to the user's preference
- Fixed the bug that hot & recently animation did not play sound in silent mode

- Added the latest popular animation
- Fix the bug that some animations are set in the wrong order
- Urgently fix some bugs that do not take effect after animation settings

- Added a new animation category: charging
- Charging animation supports turning off battery percentage
